sentences.en: Darwin eventually put forward a model of biological evolution.
sentences.cn: 达尔文最终提出了生物进化的模型。

sentences.en: He must regard the intricate patterns of evolution and coevolution.
sentences.cn: 他必须研究进化和共同进化错综复杂的类型.

sentences.en: Huxlay was an exponent of Darwin's theory of evolution.
sentences.cn: 赫胥黎是达尔文进化论的解释者.

sentences.en: Huxley was an exponent of Darwin's theory of evolution.
sentences.cn: 赫胥黎是达尔文进化论的鼓吹者.

sentences.en: Hydrogen evolution is always a possibility in water solutions.
sentences.cn: 水溶液中氢的析出永远是可能的.

sentences.en: In the course of evolution, some birds have lost the power of flight.
sentences.cn: 在进化的过程中, 一些鸟丧失了飞行能力.

sentences.en: Many thought that science had a key in Darwin's theory of evolution.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为,科学在达尔文的进化论中找到了解谜的秘诀.

sentences.en: The environment that determines our evolution is no longer essentially physical.
sentences.cn: 决定人类进化的环境已经主要地不是物质的了.

sentences.en: the evolution of the human species
The peaceful evolution of the protoplanets reached a more dramatic phase.
sentences.cn: 平静的原行星进化到富有戏剧性的状态.

sentences.en: The scientist put forth the new theory of evolution.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家提出了进化论的新理论.

sentences.en: This evolution has occurred chiefly as a response to increasing labor cost.
sentences.cn: 这种演化主要是随劳力费用增加而引起的.

sentences.en: We studied the evolution of flowers from seeds and buds.
sentences.cn: 我们研究从种籽和花蕾到花的成长过程.

sentences.en: We think about the evolution of bipedalism as one of first events that led hominids down the path to being human.
sentences.cn: 双腿直立行走的进化是原始人向人类进化的最初阶段中的一步.

sentences.en: We're dealing with probably the biggest missing link in what we know about human evolution.
sentences.cn: 我们正在解决的可能是我们所知的人类进化过程中缺失最大的一环。

words.tran_cn: 发展，进展；进化；逐步形成
发展，进化；进化；使逐步形成；推断出

phrases.tran_cn: 文化进化；文化演进；文化演化
气体逸出；天然气逸出；气体析出

trans.tran_en: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time
